faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started.

q1.question: How does MonProjetMaison help stay within budget?
q1.answer: Our budget tracking tool lets you categorize each expense, compare with initial estimates, and receive alerts for overruns. AI analysis can also identify at-risk items.

q2.question: Can I manage multiple projects?
q2.answer: Current plans include 1 active project. If you need to manage multiple projects simultaneously, contact us for a customized solution.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Yes, all your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your information with third parties.

q4.question: How do quotes and estimates work?
q4.answer: You can upload your quotes as PDFs or enter them manually. Our AI can analyze documents to extract key information and help you compare offers.

q5.question: Can I cancel or change plans?
q5.answer: You can change plans or cancel anytime. Changes take effect at the next billing period.

plans.title: Plans
plans.heroTitle: Plans designed to better manage your project from the start
plans.problemIntro: Building your own home is a significant project, both financially and personally. Even with motivation and good intentions, poor planning or imprecise management can quickly lead to costly consequences:
plans.problemHighlight: delays, rushed decisions, budget overruns, or work that needs to be redone
plans.problemConclusion: In many cases, these problems don't come from a lack of skill, but from a
plans.problemConclusionHighlight: lack of structure, visibility, and tools adapted
plans.approachTitle: An approach based on clarity and prevention
plans.approachSubtitle: Monprojetmaison.ca plans are designed to help owner-builders:
plans.approachNote: The goal is not to replace professionals, but to
plans.approachNoteEnd: and improve coordination throughout the project.
plans.evolvingTitle: Scalable plans based on your real needs
plans.evolvingDesc: Each plan offers progressive access to planning, management, and analysis tools. You can start simply, then move to more advanced features as your project grows in complexity.
plans.noWrongPlanDesc: You can start for free, explore the platform, and upgrade when your needs evolve.
plans.disclaimer: is designed exclusively for residential owner-builders. Tools and analyses serve to structure the project and support decision-making, without replacing professionals or actual quotes.
plans.benefit1Desc: Step by step, with a clear view of what's left to do.
plans.benefit2Desc: Keep control over costs and your project timeline.
plans.benefit3Desc: Documents, quotes, and notes in one place.
plans.benefit4Desc: Spot often-forgotten items before they become problems.
plans.benefit5Desc: Make more thoughtful decisions, without pressure.
